info.title: A+4BED API
info.description: This the API Docmentation of A+4BED

get.summary: Get a specific comment by ID

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: The ID of the comment to retrieve

get.summary: Get the latest comments for an article

parameters.name: articleId
parameters.description: The ID of the article for which to retrieve comments

get.summary: Get the most relevant comments for an article

parameters.name: articleId
parameters.description: The ID of the article for which to retrieve comments

post.summary: Create a new comment for an article
post.description: Create a new comment associated with a specific article.

parameters.name: articleId
parameters.description: The ID of the article for which to create a comment

userId.description: The ID of the user creating the comment

parentCommentId.description: The ID of the parent comment, if this is a reply

put.summary: Update a comment for an article
put.description: Update the content and/or score of a comment associated with a specific article.

parameters.name: articleId
parameters.description: The ID of the article for which to update a comment

commentId.description: The ID of the comment to update

content.description: The new content of the comment
content.example: This is the updated comment content.

score.description: The new score of the comment

schema.example: At least one of newContent or newScore must be provided.

delete.summary: Delete a comment for an article
delete.description: Delete a specific comment associated with a specific article.

parameters.name: articleId
parameters.description: The ID of the article for which to delete a comment

requestBody.description: The ID of the comment to delete

commentId.description: The ID of the comment to delete

get.summary: Get a specific comment by ID
get.description: Retrieve a specific comment by its commentId.

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the comment to retrieve.

get.summary: Get comments for a specific event, ordered by latest timestamp
get.description: Retrieve all comments for a specific event, ordered by latest timestamp.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the event.

200.description: A list of comments ordered by the latest timestamp.

get.summary: Get comments for a specific event, ordered by relevance score
get.description: Retrieve all comments for a specific event, ordered by relevance score.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the event.

200.description: A list of comments ordered by relevance score.

post.summary: Create a new comment for the event
post.description: Create a new comment for the event.

put.summary: Update an existing comment for the event
put.description: Update an existing comment for the event.

delete.summary: Delete an existing comment for the event
delete.description: Delete an existing comment for the event.

get.description: Retrieve the full chat history for a given conversation ID. If no chat history is found, initialize with a welcome message and predefined responses.

post.description: Send a user query to the chatbot and get the response. The query and response are stored in the chat history.

get.summary: Retrieve all chat conversations for a given user
get.description: This endpoint retrieves all chat conversations associated with a specific user, identified by their userId. The results are ordered by the timestamp in descending order.

post.summary: Create a new chat conversation for a user

put.summary: Update the title of an existing chat conversation
put.description: This endpoint updates the title of an existing chat conversation identified by its conversationId.

delete.summary: Delete an existing chat conversation along with chat histories in the chat conversation
delete.description: This endpoint deletes an existing chat conversation identified by its conversationId
